title: Ariat Men's M5 Slim Legacy Stackable Straight Leg Jean
description: LOW RISE JEAN: These Ariat men’s jeans with a low-rise design are cut slimmer through the seat and thigh featuring a stackable straight leg design. Be it working in a barn or a night out with friends, these jeans will keep you comfortable all day.

PRACTICAL FEATURES: This pair of M5 slim straight jeans for men have anchored belt loops, no-rub comfort inseams to prevent abrasion, and extra deep front pockets that add more practicality and lets you carry small valuables with ease.

GREAT GIFT FOR MEN: Be it your boyfriend, husband, or close friend, surprise them with this pair of durable Ariat’s jeans. These western jeans are just perfect for any occasion, work, or a casual day out.

EASY TO MAINTAIN: To maintain the tensile strength of the cotton fabric, you can machine wash these M5 jeans for men in cold water separately or with like colors. This won’t just clean off the dirt but also ensure that they always look new.

SCIENCE OF INNOVATION: Ariat excels in advanced technologies to deliver products that outperform in various conditions. Partnering with world-class biomechanical research groups and testing labs, Ariat strives to improve performance, comfort, and durability.
M-series denim is expertly constructed with a focus on quality, craftsmanship and style. M5 is slim through the seat and thigh, low rise and straight leg.
